title: Mekorei HaRambam LeRashash on Mishneh Torah, Foreign Worship and Customs of the Nations

titles.text: מקורי הרמב"ם לרש"ש על משנה תורה, הלכות עבודה זרה וחוקות הגויים
Mekorei HaRambam LeRashash on Mishneh Torah, Foreign Worship and Customs of the Nations

schema.key: Mekorei HaRambam LeRashash on Mishneh Torah, Foreign Worship and Customs of the Nations

enDesc: An exposition of some of the sources for the laws decided upon in Rambam's Mishneh Torah and a discussion of how these sources impact on various commentators' critiques.
